V

verifyAccessToken(String) - Method in class com.bfo.netkeystore.server.OAuth2Authorization
Given an access_token from the upstream authorization server, verify its integrity (by RFC7662, or if it's a JWT ideally by verifying its signature against a public key from the server) and return the "payload" it contains, which is expected to include fields at least including "exp" and "scope".
